input: CRM-Sys. important for mod. companies. Centr. DB for customer info necessary. Easily accessible a. updatable. Sales needs overview: customer history, interactions, buying behavior etc.. CRM must integrate email. Comm. facilitate a. doc. automatically. Reminders for follow-ups a. appointments important. Mgmt. needs reporting. Insights into pipelines a. trends. Mobile access today essential. Employees must access on the go. Data protection a. security: Top priority! Protect sensitive info. CRM customizable for spec. processes a. workflows.
